intro: Ajax macrolobus, commonly known as the large-leaf ajax, is a species of flowering plant native to Madagascar. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its large, glossy, elliptical leaves that can reach up to 30 centimeters in length. Its flowers are small, white, and clustered in inflorescences, often appearing in spring. The fruit is a capsule that splits open to release small, black seeds.
